pages.title: Ant Queen
pages.text:
The ant queen is the mother of all ants!
You can capture her inside of an $(l:antsportation:items/ant_jar)ant jar.$()
$(l:antsportation:mechanics/setup_item_transport)The ant queen is used to start a stream of ants to transport your items!$()
The ant queen is a neutral mob, so don't hit her.
If you don't want to search the world you can get ant queens from tilling dirt.
